item.title: ðŸ”§ Mechanical Engineering intern @Withings
item.description: Status Internship âœ… February 2016 - August 2016 French Touch Withings might be one of France’s finest companies. Founded by serial entrepreneur Eric Carreel (who also founded Inventel, Scuplteo, Zoov…) their products have always pioneered in the health connected devices field. Their historic connected scale has enlightened the way for many more successful products such as watches, sleep monitors etc… During my internship I had the opportunity to work on the Steel HR connected smart watch along with Manon Navellou.

item.title: ðŸ”§ Mechanical Engineering intern @Dreem
item.description: Status Internship âœ… September 2015 - February 2016 Dream Dreem Rythm’s @Dreem sleep headband aims at helping people sleep better by increase deep sleep duration through noise stimulation. In XXX 2018 they released their third iteration of the headband. I had the opportunity to work on the beta version that was about to be release at the time.
